attributes.action: Make schools mandatory to allow non-school uniform.
attributes.additional_details: Allowing non-school uniforms promotes self-expression, creativity, reduces financial burden, enhances comfort and well-being, prepares for the future, reflects cultural diversity, and encourages environmental consciousness.
attributes.background: Make the government to make it mandatory for schools to wear non-schools uniform

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639304
Ban compulsory school uniforms
